title: riot we need a warded ping
body: this should have been put in a loooooooooooong time ago telling my jgler that something is warded is so annoying i have to move back so i can type warded then ping where it is and sometimes they dont even get that and run in anyway pls just put in a warded ping and maybe even a ward that pls ping

replies.body:
Hey Sedrixx! 

Looks like you've posted on the wrong board. Please only use this board to report bugs on the live servers. For something like this, I'd suggest posting in **Miscellaneous or Gameplay**. :)

I do agree, a warded ping would be awesome to have!
